text.title: Molecular Biology of the Cell
text.more:
A text-network of "Molecular Biology of the Cell, 4th Edition". 

I'm interested to know if this visualization is useful for students studying biology
or for people doing research. I'd also like to encode the data such that it could be
used in machine learning projects.

Please contact me with your feedback: m4farrel@csclub.uwaterloo.ca.

Produced by a text-network compiler, which I am currently working on. 

Find out more about the text-network compiler and contribute at:
https://github.com/markfarrell/text-network-compiler
